Question: Pionix GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Pionix GmbH

Product: EVerest Project

- Full-featured open source software stack for EV charging
- Supports industry standards such as OCPP, ISO15118, IEC-61851
- Runs on embedded Linux with standardized interfaces
- Enables implementation of global charging standards
- Expertise in field and simulation test environments
- Participation in research projects
- Easy to get started with building own product based on EVerest
- Partnership to build an open source reference implementation for EV charging infrastructure
- Kevin Sartori joins Pionix’ Board
- Leading pioneer in open source software for EV charging
Summary_cn:
Pionix GmbH

产品：EVerest项目

- 用于电动汽车充电的功能齐全的开源软件堆栈
- 支持OCPP、ISO15118、IEC-61851等行业标准
- 在嵌入式Linux上运行，并具有标准化接口
- 能够实现全球充电标准的实施
- 在领域和仿真测试环境方面具备专业知识
- 参与研究项目
- 构建基于EVerest的自己产品容易上手
- 与合作伙伴合作构建电动汽车充电基础设施的开源参考实现
- Kevin Sartori加入Pionix董事会
- 开源电动汽车充电软件领域的领军先驱者
